issue.title: [C++] Allow use of system cpplint
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-745](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-745). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
There's a fork of cpplint that works with all the pythons. It'd be swell if we could detect if a user has it installed and use that, falling back on the one that we currently include.

https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint
